response.job_title: Technical Account Manager - Repro Printing en SIG Combibloc
response.summary: Laborious, persistent, dynamic and creative young Chemical engineer (National University of Colombia), with a double degree in papermaking and biomaterials engineering (Grenoble INP Pagora). Looking for a challenging position in which it is possible to develop skills and learn.
response.skills: Microsoft Office, Gestión de proyectos, Trabajo en equipo, Liderazgo de equipos, Inglés, Ingeniería

profile_positions.description: Printing cans: Link between the customer and production, feasibility study on artwork received from customers, prepare origination orders for repro centers, input of all graphics data into graphics database, interface to customers for all graphics related items to obtain customer approval before first production of any new or revised design (graphic and colours), quality control on repro work prior to sending jobs to customer for approval, assist / approve new graphics on production line with customer, interface to customer for approval of standards issued at first production.

company.name: SIG Group
company.description:
SIG is a leading packaging solutions provider for a more sustainable world. We work in partnership with our customers to bring food products to consumers around the world in a safe, sustainable and affordable way. Our unique technology and outstanding innovation capacity enable us to provide our customers with end-to-end solutions for differentiated products, smarter factories and connected packs, all to address the ever-changing needs of consumers.
 
Founded 1853, SIG is headquartered in Neuhausen, Switzerland. The skills and experience of our approximately 8,000 employees worldwide enable us to respond quickly and effectively to the needs of our customers in over 100 countries. In 2021, SIG produced more than 45 billion carton packs. For more information, visit www.sig.biz 

The owner and operator of this LinkedIn page is SIG Group AG ("SIG”).
